channel.title: network on 瘦了就帅了
channel.description: Recent content in network on 瘦了就帅了

item.title: Alpine Linux 网络设置
item.description: 网卡静态地址 /etc/network/interfaces auto lo iface lo inet loopback auto eth0 iface eth0 inet static address 192.168.10.16/24 gateway 192.168.10.10 hostname alpine DNS 地址 /etc/resolv.conf nameserver 114.114.114.114 重启网络 $ service networking restart
